Text: It seems there's the commentary track instead of regular movie audio. Not two channels, just the commentary. No advertised subs either, but that's a moot point here.

all respect to bone for this and the many other uploads, but this is shit. It is not the movie really, but John carpenter and some other wanker babbling on about a bunch of bullshit, like the filming sequences and so on. A complete fucking waste of time if you don't want to hear a tosser conversation. And bone, it would have been nice if youd mentioned that
